reviewtext: In the last 15+ years, I tried a number of phone headsets by different manufacturers.  This one was the best --- lightweight, adjustable metal headband (not plastic), extremely comfortable, small unbreakable mic "wand", easily accessible earpiece volume and mute control, and mic volume control, which is not common for headsets in this price range.  I used the previous headset for years until I moved overseas.  Now I'm back, I am delighted to have another one.
summary: I used one of these for years and am so happy to get another one
